item.title: dConstruct 2014
item.description: Jeremy Keith is a master curator of brilliant talks from wonderful speakers, and Fridayâ€™s dConstruct was a great event. Gone are the days where I write long connected writeups on conference themes. I wish I had the time, and venues like the Brighton Dome are far too dark to take notes. However, I really wanted to record and share some of the thoughts I got out of dConstruct, as I think the themes are very important.
